titles: Crackfart & Tony; or, knave and fool: in a dialogue over a dish of coffee, concerning matters of religion and government.
Dialogue between Tom and Dick, over a dish of coffee, concerning matters of religion and government.
notes: A reply to: L'Estrange, Sir Roger.  Citt and Bumpkin.
A reissue, with a cancel title page, of: A dialogue by Tom and Dick, over a dish of coffee, concerning matters of religion and government.
